img-width.description: the initial width of the screenshot preview image; 1. Set the width without setting the height, and scale it according to the width in equal proportion; 2. If it is not set, the size of the picture will be scaled proportionally according to the size of the crop frame during preview, and the edge will be locked. The string type only supports % units, and the number type is px
img-width.description_zh: 截屏预览图片的初始宽度; 1、设置宽度不设置高度，按照宽度等比缩放；2、如果都不设置，预览时图片大小会根据裁剪框大小进行等比缩放，进行锁边处理；; string 类型只支持 % 单位，number 类型时单位为 px

img-height.description: the initial height of the screenshot preview image; 1. Set the height without setting the width, and scale it according to the height ratio; 2. If it is not set, the size of the picture will be scaled proportionally according to the size of the crop frame during preview, and the edge will be locked. The string type only supports % units, and the number type is px
img-height.description_zh: 截屏预览图片的初始高度; 1、设置高度不设置宽度，按照高度等比缩放；2、如果都不设置，预览时图片大小会根据裁剪框大小进行等比缩放，进行锁边处理；; string 类型只支持 % 单位，number 类型时单位为 px

export-scale.description: Set the size of the exported image

quality.description: The quality of the generated image is described in the wx.canvasToTempFilePath property
quality.description_zh: 生成的图片质量 wx.canvasToTempFilePath属性介绍

file-type.description: The type of the target file is described in the wx.canvasToTempFilePath property
file-type.description_zh: 目标文件的类型，wx.canvasToTempFilePath属性介绍

events.name: confirm
events.description: Triggered when you finish taking a screenshot
events.params: {tempFilePath, width, height} 分别为生成文件的临时路径 (本地路径)、生成图片宽、生成图片高

events.name: cancel
events.description: Triggered when a screenshot is canceled

events.name: imgloaderror
events.description: Triggered when an image loads incorrectly
events.description_zh: 当图片加载错误时触发

events.name: imgloaded
events.description: Triggered when the image is loaded
events.description_zh: 当图片加载完成时触发
